com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.elements

Class Arrow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.elements.Arrow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Arrow
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Arrow connecting two Petri objects. The arrow is automatically aligned to the objects according to their relative position to each other. That way the arrow never crosses through the object itself. The arrow aligns on the top, bottom, left or right side of the label icon and is always centered on the respective side.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
